About Me

I am a certified Cloud Architect and Python Developer with a passion for building innovative and efficient solutions. With over 10 years of experience, I specialize in designing and implementing robust cloud infrastructures on AWS, GCP, and Azure.

My expertise lies in DevOps, Big Data, and automation, where I leverage tools like Kubernetes, Terraform, and Airflow to create seamless CI/CD pipelines and data workflows. I am driven by the challenge of solving complex problems and delivering high-quality, scalable systems.
